titleStmt.title: The miracles perform'd by money a poem / by the author of the humours of a coffee-house.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Edward Ward. cf. BM.
